com.codemelon.graph.graph

Class BfsGraph<T extends UndirectedSimpleVertex & BfsVertex>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.codemelon.graph.graph.AbstractGraph<T>
      • com.codemelon.graph.graph.BfsGraph<T>

  • public class BfsGraph<T extends UndirectedSimpleVertex & BfsVertex>
extends AbstractGraph<T>
    Undirected graph meeting the requirements for conducting breadth-first search

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BfsGraph()
      Initialize graph to a default initial capacity of 16 vertices
      BfsGraph(java.util.Collection<T> vertices)
      Use the vertices in a collection as the initial vertices in the graph
      BfsGraph(int initialCapacity)
      Initialize graph to have capacity for the given number of vertices

        public final int edgeCount()
        Description copied from class: AbstractGraph
        Returns the number of edges in the graph. This method is abstract because the implementation will differ in directed and undirected graphs.
